title: Sugao no Kimi wo Aishiteru
original_name: 素顔の君をあいしてる
sinopse:
After selecting his character, with only the light from the screen and playing an online game, he met this girl named "Chiro". It was love at first sight for him. As he followed the phases of the game, he had this thought of ​​getting to know that person on the other side. It was when they met, that he discovers she was actually a man ...

(Source: MU)
